text: hana u Dhawaanina Xoolaha Agoonta si Fiican mooyee intay ka Gaadhaan Xoogooda, Dhammaystirana Miisidda iyo Miisaanka, si Caddaalada, laguma kalifo Nafi waxayna karin haddaad hadlaysaanna Caddaalad fala, Qaraababa ha ahaadee, oofiyana Ballanka Eebe, Sidaasaana Eebe idin faray inaad waantoowdaan.
